page.title: 19A BETTER VILLAGE--T.STAFFORD
page.content: IT'S NICE LIVING HERE BUT IT COULD BE IMPROVED BY HAVING A GYMNASIUM AND TENNIS COURTS BECAUSE I LIKE DOING SPORTY THINGS.ALSO A SWIMMING POOL WOULD BE NICE TO HAVE. MORE SHOPS,AND SWEETS A LOT CHEAPER. A TOY SHOP WOULD BE GOOD BECAUSE THERE AREN'T A LOT AROUND HERE AND THERE ARE ONLY A FEW IN ILKESTON. NO SCHOOL ON TUESDAY MORNING AND IT STARTS AT 3.00PM AND ENDS AT 3.15PM BECAUSE THEN I CAN GO TO NANAS. A SLIDE AND A ROUNDABOUT ON THE REC. A LIBRARY IN THE VILLAGE WOULD BE O.K. BECAUSE THEN I WOULDN'T HAVE TO GO TO ILKESTON TO CHANGE MY BOOKS. MORE ONE-WEEK HOLIDAYS FROM SCHOOL.
